pages.text: Spell scrolls are magical parchments that can contain one inscribed spell that the user can cast like a true scepter. To craft a scroll, one must first create an empty one that is ready to accept magic.$(br2)Empty spell scrolls can also be found in certain loot chests, providing one of the earliest opportunities to cast spells if you get lucky with exploration.
See the next pages for recipes to make spell scrolls...
